email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider something in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, the demurrage rate is a bit steep. Could we negotiate it down to $20,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to get the demurrage rate down to $22,000 per day, which is the best I can do. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for your efforts. $22,000 per day for demurrage is acceptable. Let’s lock in the freight rate at $51.00 per metric ton. Please send over the fixture recap for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the fixture recap and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best, Sarah
